DOC.brief_summary: This study ass safety efficacy different dos sotrastaurin combine tacrolimus prevention acute rejection de novo liver transplantation .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Sotrastaurin-tacrolimus vs. Mycophenolic Acid-tacrolimus de Novo Liver Transplant Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Recipients race , 18 year old Recipients primary de novo orthotopic liver transplant decease donor Recipients kidney cold ischemia time < 30 hour HCVnegative recipient Exclusion criterion : Prior organ/cellular transplant multiple organ transplant MELDscore > 35 HCC > Milan criterion Donor age < 12 year Cold ischemia > 15 hour Patients treat drug strong inducer inhibitor cytochrome P450 3A4 ( CYP3A4 ) drug QTprolonging property Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
